name: tester
author: yacut
description: A interactive test runner with IDE based Feedback

gutterEnabled.title: Gutter Enabled
gutterEnabled.description: Should show test results in gutter highlights?

gutterPosition.title: Gutter Position
gutterPosition.description: Where should be the position of the gutter highlights?

ansiToHtml.title: Convert ansi console output to html
ansiToHtml.description: If console output has ansi colors should it convert to html colors?

showInlineError.title: Show errors inline after test run
showInlineError.description: Should show errors in text editor after test run?

inlineErrorPosition.title: Inline error position
inlineErrorPosition.description: Should show errors in text editor after or before test case?

showNotifications.title: Show notifications after test run
showNotifications.description: Should show notifications after test run if editor not active?

scrollToBottom.title: Scroll console output to bottom after test run
scrollToBottom.description: Should scroll console output to bottom after test run?

statusBarOnClick.title: Status Bar on click
statusBarOnClick.description: What should opens on status bar click?

statusBarPosition.title: Status bar position
statusBarPosition.description: Which position should be status bar: left or right?

statusBarPriority.title: Status bar priority
statusBarPriority.description: Lower priority tiles are placed further to the position side.

softWrapDefault.title: Soft Wrap default
softWrapDefault.description: Should wrap the text in results view?

removeCurrentFileFilterIfProjectTest.title: Remove current file only filter if project test run
removeCurrentFileFilterIfProjectTest.description: Should remove current file filter if project test run?
